channel.title: zsh on The views expressed
channel.description: Recent content in zsh on The views expressed

item.title: About
item.description: Colophon The views expressed is built by Hugo, hosted on GitHub Pages, and cached by Cloudflare. It is developed on an Apple MacBook using vscode, hyper, and zsh. Content is written with a variety of editing tools. Text usually starts in Drafts on an iPhone or an iPad, and sometimes, even on an Apple watch. Some ideas gain flesh and substance with mind-mapping in MindNode. Content that takes time to develop is tracked with Things.

item.title: zsh notes
item.description: zsh startup and shutdown condition first second always /etc/zshenv ${HOME}/.zshenv login /etc/zprofile ${HOME}/.zprofile interactive /etc/zshrc ${HOME}/.zshrc login at startup /etc/zlogin ${HOME}/.zlogin login at shutdown ${HOME}/.zlogout /etc/zlogout use if [[ -o rcs ]]; then ... to prevent execution after first in zshenv from man reading zcompile to pre-compile
